ampvis2
  • Get Started
  • Reference

Export OTU-table

Export otutable (including taxonomy) from an ampvis2 object.

amp_export_otutable(data)

Arguments

data

(required) Data list as loaded with amp_load().
filename

File name of the exported OTU-table. (default: "exported_otutable.txt")
id

Name the samples using a variable in the metadata.
sort_samples

Vector to sort the samples by.
raw

(logical) Use raw counts instead of percentages. (default: FALSE)

Examples

#Load example data
data("AalborgWWTPs")

#Export OTU-table
# NOT RUN {
amp_export_otutable(AalborgWWTPs)
# }
